examples.en: I went to the bank to deposit money.
The plane banked sharply to avoid the storm.
examples.zh: 飞机为了避开风暴而急剧倾斜。

examples.en: She banked her salary every month.
examples.zh: 她每个月都把薪水存入银行。

examples.en: The money has been banked for future use.
examples.zh: 这些钱已经存入银行以备将来使用。

examples.en: He banked the boat on the riverbank.
